mapper.select: select distinct First.host_id, first.aim_id from tea.relation First ,tea.relation SECOND WHERE First.aim_id = SECOND.host_id AND First.host_id = SECOND.aim_id AND First.host_id=#{hostId};

select 0,a.aim_id from( (select distinct first.aim_id from tea.relation as First ,tea.relation as SECOND WHERE First.aim_id = SECOND.host_id AND First.host_id = SECOND.aim_id AND First.host_id=#{param1}) AS a , (select distinct First1.aim_id from tea.relation as First1 ,tea.relation as SECOND1 WHERE First1.aim_id = SECOND1.host_id AND First1.host_id = SECOND1.aim_id AND First1.host_id=#{param2}) AS b ) where a.aim_id = b.aim_id;
